section.title: Spring Integration Home
section.para: The definitive source of information about Spring Integration is the Spring Integration Home at https://www.springsource.org. That site serves as a hub of information and is the best place to find up-to-date announcements about the project as well as links to articles, blogs, and new sample applications.
